about_the_game:
About the Game:

E.O.T.B is a first person psychological horror game and you guessed it, its theme is the Backrooms.Heavily Inspired by the eeriness of liminal spaces, i decided to make a rather cinematic yet creepy version of the Backrooms world.

You play as Oliver, a mechanic at a secret underground laboratory. There, a non government organization tries multiple tests to achieve creating a time machine, however while tweaking one of the machines it errors, creating a dimension paradox, specifically a portal to a non-linear dimension, the Backrooms. A place where time and space unfold in unforeseen ways. Will you find a way back to your reality? Or will you become part of this twisted horror dimension?

Quick Dev Note

Keep in mind that this game was single handedly crafted from scratch by 1 person. Reaching this level of visual quality and sound design was more than difficult. So it would be more than appreciated to make some very specific review exceptions like the translations not being 100% accurate since they are machine translated, or the graphics optimization tool being a bit difficult to use.

sincerely,

Alexandros Koulas / DarkSight Studio

TECHNOLOGICAL FEATURES

I've created this game mostly focusing on atmosphere and breath taking visuals using Unreal Engine 5.3,thus the following systems/technologies are used:

-Next Gen 3D Lighting technology, using Lumen both software and hardware Ray Tracing features like Ray Traced Shadows, Accurate Global Illumination and real time lighting.

-Immersive 3D Sound Technology from Microsoft. Project Acoustics, offering spatialized and binaural audio integration, making sound effects, ambience and music interact with the 3D environment. Long story short, physically based sound rendering.

And on top of the 3D physically based audio rendering EOTB features, the game uses Steam Audio spatialization.

Steam Audio uses three-dimensional precision game audio to immerse players in a more realistic, more intense cinematic experience. Sounds with lifelike details are precisely rendered all around the player, so they feel like they are deeper inside the game.

-Next Gen Upscaling Technology from NVIDIA,featuring 2 upscaling methods, making your game run faster while maintaining the same visual quality.

DLSS and NIS

-A kind of complicated, yet solid main menu featuring more than all the needed options to optimize or tweak the performance/control of the gameplay to your liking.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has corpses and frightening monsters and blood,with realistic visuals.It doesnt have any nudity,raping or other 18+ content.

detailed_description:
About the Game:

E.O.T.B is a first person psychological horror game and you guessed it, its theme is the Backrooms.Heavily Inspired by the eeriness of liminal spaces, i decided to make a rather cinematic yet creepy version of the Backrooms world.

You play as Oliver, a mechanic at a secret underground laboratory. There, a non government organization tries multiple tests to achieve creating a time machine, however while tweaking one of the machines it errors, creating a dimension paradox, specifically a portal to a non-linear dimension, the Backrooms. A place where time and space unfold in unforeseen ways. Will you find a way back to your reality? Or will you become part of this twisted horror dimension?

Quick Dev Note

Keep in mind that this game was single handedly crafted from scratch by 1 person. Reaching this level of visual quality and sound design was more than difficult. So it would be more than appreciated to make some very specific review exceptions like the translations not being 100% accurate since they are machine translated, or the graphics optimization tool being a bit difficult to use.

sincerely,

Alexandros Koulas / DarkSight Studio

TECHNOLOGICAL FEATURES

I've created this game mostly focusing on atmosphere and breath taking visuals using Unreal Engine 5.3,thus the following systems/technologies are used:

-Next Gen 3D Lighting technology, using Lumen both software and hardware Ray Tracing features like Ray Traced Shadows, Accurate Global Illumination and real time lighting.

-Immersive 3D Sound Technology from Microsoft. Project Acoustics, offering spatialized and binaural audio integration, making sound effects, ambience and music interact with the 3D environment. Long story short, physically based sound rendering.

And on top of the 3D physically based audio rendering EOTB features, the game uses Steam Audio spatialization.

Steam Audio uses three-dimensional precision game audio to immerse players in a more realistic, more intense cinematic experience. Sounds with lifelike details are precisely rendered all around the player, so they feel like they are deeper inside the game.

-Next Gen Upscaling Technology from NVIDIA,featuring 2 upscaling methods, making your game run faster while maintaining the same visual quality.

DLSS and NIS

-A kind of complicated, yet solid main menu featuring more than all the needed options to optimize or tweak the performance/control of the gameplay to your liking.
name: Echoes of The Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1650, NVIDIA RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: NA
  • Additional Notes: Please make sure you have similar hardware specs to the above,which is a 4-6 core CPU and a GPU that runs close to a 3050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060, NVIDIA RTX 4060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • VR Support: NA
  • Additional Notes: Above hardware is recommended to experience the originally designed visuals and atmosphere of the game at a smooth framerate.

short_description: "Echoes of The Backrooms" is an indie horror game that masterfully captures the unsettling atmosphere of the Backrooms and the uncanny eeriness of liminal spaces. This game excels in creating an immersive horror experience with its cinema-quality visuals and meticulously crafted environments.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
